org.osgeo.mapguide

Class MgMapBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgObject
      • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgDisposable
        • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgGuardDisposable

            • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgNamedSerializable
              • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgResource
                • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgMapBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MgMap

    public class MgMapBase
extends MgResource
    Defines the runtime state of a map.

      • create

        public void create(MgResourceService resourceService,
                   MgResourceIdentifier mapDefinition,
                   java.lang.String mapName)
        Initializes a new MgMapBase object given a resource service, map definition, and a name for the map. This method is used for MapGuide Viewers or for offline map production.
        Parameters:
        resourceService - An MgResourceService that can be used to retrieve the map definition.
        mapDefinition - An MgResourceIdentifier that specifies the location of the map definition in a resource repository.
        mapName - A string that specifies the name of the map.

      • create

        public void create(java.lang.String mapSRS,
                   MgEnvelope mapExtent,
                   java.lang.String mapName)
        Initializes a new MgMapBase object given a spatial reference system, spatial extent of the map, and a name for the map. This method is used for the WMS service implementation and creates a map without any layers.
        Parameters:
        mapSRS - A string specifying the spatial reference system in OpenGIS WKT format.
        mapExtent - An MgEnvelope defining the overall extent of the map.
        mapName - A string that specifies the name of the map.

      • open

        public void open(MgResourceService resourceService,
                 java.lang.String mapName)
        Loads the map object from a session repository.
        Parameters:
        resourceService - An MgResourceService that can be used to retrieve the map.
        mapName - A string that specifies the name of the map. This

      • getViewCenter

        public MgPoint getViewCenter()

      • getFiniteDisplayScaleAt

        public double getFiniteDisplayScaleAt(int index)
        Gets the finite display scale at the specified index.
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the finite display scale to get.
        Returns:
        Returns the finite display scale.
        Throws:
        MgException - with code MgOutOfRangeException if the index is invalid.
